name: create-static-site
description: This is a simple script mostly copied from [Harriet ryder's article](https://medium.com/northcoders/creating-a-project-generator-with-node-29e13b3cd309) that uses [Inquirer.js](https://github.com/SBoudrias/Inquirer.js) and the [fs](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html) module to generate a [Hugo](https://gohugo.io/) or [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) template onto the current directory.
author: fourjuaneight
